title: Wonâ€™t Get Fooled Again
lyrics:
[intro] (A)  (G)  (D)  x2
 
We'll be (A)fighting in the (D)streets with our (A)children at our (D)feet
and the (A)morals that they (D)worship will be (E)gone
And the (A)men who spurred us (D)on sit in (A)judgement of all (D)wrong
they de(A)cide and the (D)shotgun sings the (E)song (G)  (D)
 
[chorus]
I'll (D)tip my (A)hat to the (D)new consti(A)tution
(D)Take a (A)bow for the (D)new revo(A)lution
(D)Smile and (A)grin at the (D)change all a(A)round
(G)Take up my guitar and (E7)play
(G)Just like yester(E7)day
And I'll (G)get on my knees and (D)pray
(D7-stop) We don't get fooled again
(A)  (G)  (D)  x2
 
The (A)change it had to (D)come we (A)knew it all a(D)long
We were (A)liberated (D)from the fold that's (E)all
And the (A)world looks just the (D)same and (A)history ain't (D)changed
Cause the (A)banners were all (D)flown in the last (E)war (G)  (D)
 
[chorus]
I'll (D)tip my (A)hat to the (D)new consti(A)tution
(D)Take a (A)bow for the (D)new revo(A)lution
(D)Smile and (A)grin at the (D)change all a(A)round
(G)Take up my guitar and (E7)play
(G)Just like yester(E7)day
And I'll (G)get on my knees and (D)pray
(D7-stop) We don't get fooled again
(A)  (G)  (D)  x2
 
I'll (B)move my(Bsus4)self and my (B)family aside
(E) If we happen to be left half alive
I'll (A)get all my papers and smile at the sky
Though I (B7)know that the hypnotized never (B)lie (A)  (E)
(B)  (A)  (E) 
(A)  (G)  (D)  x2
 
(A)Nothing in the (D)street looks any (A)different to (D)me
And the (A)slogans are re(D)placed by the (E)by
And the (A)parting on the (D)left is now (A)parting on the (D)right
And the (A)beards have all grown (D)longer over (E)night (G)  (D)
 
[chorus]
I'll (D)tip my (A)hat to the (D)new consti(A)tution
(D)Take a (A)bow for the (D)new revo(A)lution
(D)Smile and (A)grin at the (D)change all a(A)round
(G)Take up my guitar and (E7)play
(G)Just like yester(E7)day
And I'll (G)get on my knees and (D)pray
(D7-stop) We don't get fooled again
(A)  (G)  (D)  x2
 
(A)Meet the new boss (G)  (D)
(A)Same as the old boss (G)  (D)  
(A-single strum) [end]
